fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Food Safety, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Food safety and nutrition, sustainability, emissions and CSR, trade negotations and remedies
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission expert group on climate change policy #E03590#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3590#Member#C
goals__remit:
EUPPA is the European Potato Processors' Association, which has been created in 1962 as the 'Union Européenne des Industries Transformatrices de la Pomme de Terre (UEITP)'. 
 
EUPPA is representing the most important European potato processing countries : Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden and Great Britain.
